attributes.action: OPEN UP THE BARS AND RESTAURANTS IN THE PALACE OF WESTMINSTERFOR USE BY ANYBODY WHOMPAYS UK INCOME TAX.
attributes.additional_details: It cannot be right that people who are, by law, required to pay for the food and alcohol supplied to our elected dishonourables and other in the Palace of Westminster should be barred from using it.  It is NOT a private members club where the members bear the cost of running the place.  It is actually a workplace canteen, and the ONLY workplace canteen from which the employer of the workers who use it are barred, and this MUST be corrected.  Action must be taken now to open upthis politicians and Lords' scam to those who fund it.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House authorities not for Government
